text: St. Peter-Pagig was a municipality of the district of Plessur in the canton of Graubünden in Switzerland. ==History== It was formed on 1 January 2008, through the merger of St. Peter and Pagig. On 1 January 2013, the former municipalities of St. Peter-Pagig, Calfreisen, Castiel, Langwies, Lüen, Molinis and Peist merged into the municipality of Arosa. ==Gallery== Schanfigg St. Peter.jpg|St. Peter Pagig.jpg|Pagig ==Other websites== Category:2008 establishments in Switzerland Category:2013 disestablishments in Switzerland Category:Former municipalities of Graubünden
title: St. Peter-Pagig
